SEARCH
Package mvc

Class SettingsData

java.lang.Object
mvc.SettingsData
public class SettingsData extends Object
This model class stores and updates the game's settings. It loads/ saves data using the settings data file. All users share the same game settings.
Since:
Mar 12, 2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon McCabe

  • Method Details

    • importData

      public static SettingsData importData()
      Decode the encoded data stored in the settings data file.
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename of settings file
      Returns:
      SettingsData, or null if the file does not exist
      See Also:
      • for details.

    • exportData

      public void exportData()
      Export this user's data to the user data file. Format: (without spaces)
      "screenHeight, screenWidth, colourblindMode, volumeLevel"

    • getScreenWidth

      public int getScreenWidth()
      Access the screen width.
      Returns:
      Screen width

    • getScreenHeight

      public int getScreenHeight()
      Access the screen height.
      Returns:
      Screen height

    • getColourblindMode

      public boolean getColourblindMode()
      Access the colourblind mode.
      Returns:
      Colourblind mode (true = enabled)

    • getVolumePercentage

      public int getVolumePercentage()
      Access the volume level.
      Returns:
      Volume percentage (0..100)

    • setScreenWidth

      public void setScreenWidth(int screenWidth)
      Mutate the screen width (if it is non-negative).
      Parameters:
      screenWidth - Screen width
